content:
1. Are you talking about Thunderbird (desktop) or Thunderbird for Android?

(A) If you are talking about Thunderbird (desktop): Here is Thunderbird for Android Community Forum. You should post your question in Thunderbird Community Forum instead: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/thunderbird

(B) If you are talking about Thunderbird for Android: As far as I know, Thunderbird for Android does not have add-ons.

2. I am sorry that I cannot understand the relation between "viewing .mpeg files" (.mpeg files are video files) and "installing ImportExportTools NG".
creator: Yu5tiqX9og

content:
Thunderbird for Android does not have calendar of its own.

You can post feature request in the following forum: https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/idb-p/ideas/label-name/thunderbird%20android

There is the same feature request in the above forum already, and you can upvote it: Calendar support on Thunderbird mobile https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/calendar-support-on-thunderbird-mobile/idi-p/76394
creator: Yu5tiqX9og

content: Yes Calender is indeed required on the android app too.
creator: junkboxtv
